pr_title: Add Mongo unit test classes for latest 3.6.20 and 4.4.1

replies.bodyText: Put them in a separate commit, let me know if I should roll them in to the second commit.
replies.author: adamjshook

timeline.bodyText: Please extract refactor to separate commit.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: I would name this commit as: Extract BaseMongoDistributedQueries. Also please mention that we are removing test coverage here and restoring in subsuequent commit, and that is because that we won't to retain the file changes history.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
Also please mention that we are removing test coverage here and restoring in subsuequent commit, and that is because that we won't to retain the file changes history.

This part left unaddressed.
replies.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe leave this method and instead provide createMongoServer?
Another option (preferable by me) would be to remove createQueryRunner method and server field, and maintain it in the class that creates it. More code is duplicated, but I find inheritance of infrastructure as bad practice.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.message: Update MongoDB docs with tested versions

timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: We are testing the latest 3.x here and there is a TestMongo4DistributedQueriesLatest for the latest in major version 4.
replies.author: adamjshook

timeline.message:
Extract BaseMongoDistributedQueries

This removes test coverage but it is restored in the
next commit. We want to retain the history on the
file changes.

timeline.bodyText: The best would be to pass just a version, not entire docker image name.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: Assuming that we have two latests classes, let's call it TestMongo3DistributedQueriesLatest.
timeline.author: kokosing
